subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: This is where Coach Rick Neuheisel always imagined he would be: standing at Spaulding Field, in the shadow of Pauley Pavilion, wearing a U.C.L.A. baseball cap.
snippet: This is where Coach Rick Neuheisel always imagined he would be: standing at Spaulding Field, in the shadow of Pauley Pavilion, wearing a U.C.L.A. baseball cap.
